downloadTitle: Zune Player and Zune HD Player Product Manuals
downloadDescription: Online copies of the Zune Player and Zune HD Player product manuals.
detailsSection: This download contains the online copies of the printed Zune Player and Zune HD Player product manuals.
systemRequirementsSection: The files are in Adobe Acrobat (.pdf) format.  Please make sure that you have the appropriate reader for the files.
installInstructionSection:
1. Please download the files with .zip extension relevant to your device.
  2. Right click on the file and choose "Open With"->"Compressed (zipped) Folders".
  3. There should be a file with .pdf extension in the compressed folder.
  4. Double click on the .pdf file to open it or you can copy it to another folder before you open it.
